About

“Writing the first 90 percent of a computer program takes 90 percent of the time. The remaining ten percent also takes 90 percent of the time and the final touches also take 90 percent of the time.”N.J. Rubenking

Web Developer & UI/UX Designer.

I’m a Front-End Developer located in Dallas/DFW Area. I have a serious passion for develop webs and UI effects, animations and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences. Well-organised person, problem solver, independent employee with high attention to detail. Fan of video games, outdoor activities, TV series and Action movies. A family person and father of three kids,

I help designers, small agencies and businesses bring their ideas to life. Powered by VS Code, Wordpress or Bootstrap. Interested in the entire frontend spectrum and working on ambitious projects with positive people.

Projects and Colaborations

FRONT-END DEVELOPER (BOOTSTRAP CAMPSITES)

Technologies: Bootstrap, CSS, SCSS, Material-UI, JSON, API, and Netlify. This site was created with Bootstrap framework and responsive design that makes use of flexible layouts, flexible images and cascading style sheet media queries. The goal of responsive design is to build web pages that detect the visitor's screen size and orientation and change the layout accordingly. URL to Nucamp Campsites Bootstrap Source Code/GitHub

FRONT-END DEVELOPER (BOOTSTRAP PERSONAL PORTFOLIO)

Technologies: Bootstrap, CSS, Material-UI, JSON, API, and Netlify. Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS- and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components. URL to Bootstrap Personal Portfolio Source Code/GitHub

FRONT-END DEVELOPER (REACT CAMPSITES)

Technologies: React, React-Redux, CSS, Material-UI, JSON, API, and Netlify. React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components. It is maintained by Facebook and a community of individual developers and companies. React can be used as a base in the development of single-page or mobile applications. URL to Nucamp Campsites React Source Code/GitHub

FRONT-END DEVELOPER (REACT PERSONAL PORTFOLIO)

Technologies: React, Material-UI, JSON, API, and Netlify Converting my bootstrap portfolio website to a single page application. React is the #1 JavaScript library for building websites, this website also contains advanced aspects of JavaScript ES6, React Components and will develop React-Redux based applications. URL to React Personal Portfolio Source Code/GitHub

FRONT-END DEVELOPER (REACT-NATIVE CAMPSITES APP)

Technologies: React-Native, React-Redux, Expo.io, IOS Emulator, Material-UI, JSON, API, and Expo Snack. React Native is an open-source mobile application framework created by Facebook, Inc. It is used to develop applications for Android, Android TV, iOS, macOS, tvOS, Web, Windows and UWP by enabling developers to use React's framework along with native platform capabilities. URL to React-Native Campsites Source Code/GitHub

FRONT-END DEVELOPER (REACT-NATIVE PERSONAL PORTFOLIO APP)

Technologies: React-Native, Expo.io, IOS Emulator, Material-UI, JSON, API, and Expo Snack. Converting React personal portfolio project into REACT-NATIVE App. URL to React-Native Personal Portfolio Source Code/GitHub

FRONT-END DEVELOPER (JAVASCRIPT TEXT ANIMATIONS)

Technologies: javaScript, jQuery, API, and Netlify JavaScript animations are done by programming gradual changes in an element's style. The changes are called by a timer. When the timer interval is small, the animation looks continuous. URL to Text Animations Source Code/GitHub

FULL STACK DEVELOPER (NUCAMP CAMPSITE/ NUCAMSITESERVER)

Technologies: React, React-Native, Redux, API, Node.Js, MongoDB, Express, Mongoose and Netlify. Campsite application develop to show campsite places to front end UI and UX design, MongoDB was created to have the data base of each campsite with comments, rating and login information for each user. Netlify was use to host the campsite website. URL to Text Animations Source Code/GitHub

FRONT-END DEVELOPER (GOOGLE CLONE WEBSITE)

Technologies: HTML, CSS, javaScritp and Netlify. Google clone website fully function search engine, was made to test skills and layouts from one of the most visit pages around the world. No URL for copyright Source Code/GitHub

FRONT-END DEVELOPER (REACT-NATIVE TRAVEL APP-HONORS PROJECT)

Technologies: React-Native, Expo.io, IOS Emulator, Material-UI, JSON, API, and Expo Snack.
